channel.title: LemurScape V1! Tons of minigames & features! Pictures inside!
channel.description:
I have been working on a new project. I have quit Chris-Scape, because of all the rude "leeched!" comments. This is NOT leeched. I will start off with credits: [center][b][i][u]Credits[/u][/i][/b] 30% Fubergen (for client base) 70% Me (for adding minigames, zones, etc.)[/center]
[center][b][i][u]Download Links![/u][/i][/b] [b]Source:[/b] [u]Mediafire...[/u] http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zmnm22mmmn1 [u]Megaupload...[/u] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SVT1OA1L [b]Client:[/b] [u]Mediafire...[/u] http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?c3yzjy4djom [u]Megaupload...[/u] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WLIB06R0
[center][b][i][u]Pictures[/u][/i][/b]
HOME & WELCOME: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6gem8l.jpg[/img]
BARROWS MADE SIMPLE BY ME: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33llez4.jpg[/img]
IN-GAME TOP 10 HIGHSCORES: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/np50sw.jpg[/img]
LOGIN & WELCOME SCREEN PLUS CUSTOM CROWNS: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/v3zhmu.jpg[/img]
BOUNTY HUNTER WITH WORKING PANEL, TIMERS, REWARDS, PENALTIES, AND POINTS SYSTEM: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lntvs4.jpg[/img]
JAD - WILL MOVE IN V2: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/edjrk.jpg[/img]
JUNGLE DEMONS - KILL 10 FOR USE OF THE DRAGON SCIMITAR: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/sliukw.jpg[/img]
WEAPON REQUIREMENT SCREEN: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2vjsawl.jpg[/img]
CASTLE WARS PKING: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2afzzg5.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b][i][u]YouTube Video Tour![/u][/i][/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kkwnnwGGw28
